title: Colab Enterprise - Access control with IAM
abstract:
# Colab Enterprise - Access control with IAM
# Access control with IAM
This page describes how to use [Identity and Access Management (IAM)](/iam) to manage access to Colab Enterprise resources. To manage access for other Vertex AI resources, see [Vertex AIaccess control with IAM](/vertex-ai/docs/general/access-control) .
